  • Constructor Details

    • HVACSystem

      public HVACSystem(int deviceSystemID, HVAC hvac, TemperatureController controller, TemperatureSensor internalSensor, TemperatureSensor externalSensor, UserInputSensor userInputSensor)
      Creates a new HVACSystem with the specified components.
      Parameters:
      deviceSystemID - The unique ID of the device system.
      hvac - The HVAC appliance associated with this system.
      controller - The temperature controller associated with this system.
      internalSensor - The internal temperature sensor associated with this system.
      externalSensor - The external temperature sensor associated with this system.
      userInputSensor - The user input sensor associated with this system.

    • onTick

      public void onTick()
      Performs actions during each tick, including reading temperature sensors, processing user input, updating the controller, and managing the HVAC system.
      Specified by:

    • setRoom

      public void setRoom(Room room)
      Sets the room associated with this HVACSystem. Since an HVAC system doesn't directly relate to a room, this method does nothing.
      Specified by:
      setRoom in class DeviceSystem
      Parameters:
      room - The room to associate with this system.
